title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Monday 13 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: four players agree new deals with tigers .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from leicestershire local live - updates will start again on tuesday at 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : feeling warmer on tuesday
text: patchy low cloud and clear spells overnight .
cloud could be thick enough to produce some drizzle .
a minimum temperature of 2c ( 36f ) .
some sunny spells to start tuesday but turning increasingly cloudy with a few outbreaks of light rain into the early evening .
feeling a little less cold than monday with lighter winds .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: eight arrested after new parks stabbing
text: police are still investigating a stabbing that happened in new parks on thursday .
they say a 19-year-old man remains in hospital in a stable condition .
it happened on aikman close just before 17:00 during a fight involving `` a large number of people '' .
eight people have been arrested so far - four have been released without charge and four , including a 15-year-old , have been released on bail .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: another man bailed over gbh in ashby
text: a fourth man arrested on on sus of grievous bodily harm during a fight in ashby over the weekend has been released on bail .
police have said the victim remains in hospital in a critical condition .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'eye watering ' speeds in leicestershire village
text: more than half a million motorists have been caught speeding in sharnford in just over a year .
author: Hinckley Times

documents.title: your photos : sunshine in bradgate park
text: check out this fantastic photo captured by cup cake steve at bradgate park today
with blue sky like that it could almost be a summer day .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: comment from hunt group
text: the animal rights group has said they were tracking the hunt in shackerstone on saturday when the `` unprovoked attack '' took place .
the atherstone hunt has released this statement : i can confirm that the atherstone hunt are co-operating with the police and all available video footage has been handed to them .
we are not able to comment further while the investigation is ongoing . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hunt saboteur had hospital treatment
text: a man has been arrested on sus of causing actual bodily harm following the confrontation between atherstone hunt members and the hunt saboteurs in leicestershire .
the hunt saboteurs group has said one of their members had to have her head glued back together in hospital .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : saboteur 'assaulted ' by fox hunter
text: this shocking footage appears to show a hunt saboteur being struck during a hunt in leicestershire
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : ruud gullit on foxes squad
text: should more foxes players have been let go like n'golo kante last summer ?
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: tigers keep hold of o'connor
text: leicester tigers have announced yet another of their players will be staying on with the club - this time it 's back-row forward brendon o'connor .
the 27-year-old flanker has now made 29 appearances for the club .

head coach aaron mauger said : we feel that brendon brings a high-quality continuity game to our team and suits the style of rugby we want to play due to his support lines and skills with ball in hand .
we believe that his best years are right in front of him so we look forward to working closely with him during this period . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: long delays on motorway
text: the delays on the m1 northbound look rather unpleasant
this is between j20 and j21 where two lanes are closed for emergency repairs .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: father 's plea for information on son 's murder
text: mr lebato 's father , tagbeu lebato , has also released an emotional plea for help to catch his son 's killer .
in a statement released through police , he said : lauric was the first person in my life , the centre of it , and was so very , very , important to me .
`` i do n't want anyone else to go through what i have and i do n't want this to happen to someone else 's relative .
`` you must pass on information to police , no matter what it is , do n't hold it back . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: murdered student had been partying
text: we told you earlier about the death of a man in albion street in the early hours of saturday .
police have now said 22-year-old lauric lebato had been at a party in a block of flats in the street before he was attacked .
they 've asked any students who were at the party , or might have heard about what happened since , to come forward .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: photos : dog walking in wigston
text: here 's another of my dog-walking photos from the weekend - as you can see it was very muddy by the canal
send in your photos by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: government comment on 'albanian murderer '
text: an update on that story in the daily mail today which claims an albanian murderer is running a car wash in oadby .
we 've been in touch with the home office who sent us this statement
`` this government puts the safety of our families , communities and country first and we are determined to deport any foreign national offender who poses a threat to the uk .
we have taken action like introducing `` deport first appeal later '' to stop this kind of thing happening '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fitzgerald extends stay
text: another leicester tigers player has committed to more time at the club - mike fitzgerald
the 29-year-old joined tigers in the summer of 2015 and has made 44 appearances and scored four tries .
fitzgerald said : i 've enjoyed my time at the club so far and settled well here with my family .
it was an easy decision to make to stay with the club . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: travel : lanes closed on m1
text: two lanes are now closed and there 's queuing traffic on the m1 northbound between j20 ( lutterworth ) and j21 ( leicester ) , because of emergency repairs .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: jobs for inmates at hmp leicester
text: leicester prison has been revealed as being one of the worse in the country for getting inmates jobs
it follows an undercover visit by bbc panorama that showed `` chaos '' at hmp northumberland .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bateman praises tigers teammates
text: `` i 've thoroughly enjoyed my year-and-a-half here so far .
we 've got a great bunch of lads here and a good environment across the board .
it 's a club where everyone wants to achieve success and i want to continue to be part of that . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: rugby : tigers agree new deal with bateman
text: another leicester tigers player who has agreed a new deal is front-rower greg bateman .
he signed from exeter chiefs in the summer of 2015 and has made 29 first-team appearances for tigers .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: rugby : kitto to stay at tigers
text: scrum-half jono kitto has agreed a new deal to stay at leicester tigers .
kitto joined tigers in the summer of 2015 and has made 24 first-team appearances so far .
he said : i 've felt very honoured to be part of a club as prestigious as the leicester tigers and to be able to represent what the club stands for as often as i have is great .
i was very happy to agree a new contract and remain part of that . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: out-of-date promotions in leicester
text: the undercover reporter went to tesco on narborough road in leicester on 16 january - one of the promotions on offer had actually expired on boxing day .
any customers trying you use the `` two for £ 3.00 '' offer would have actually ended up paying the full price of £ 4.00 .
over in evington there was a product advertised as being on a `` 3 for 2 '' deal but the offer had actually ended 10 days earlier .
customers would have paid 50p more than expected .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tesco customers overcharged in leicester
text: a bbc investigation into tesco has found some customers are being short-changed by promotions which have expired but are still advertised on the shelves
two stores in leicester were visited as part of the investigation - the tesco superstore on narborough road and tesco metro in evington .
both were displaying some out-of-date promotions .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rutland have 'good ' contact with care leavers
text: the same ofsted review was carried out into children 's services in rutland and found the authority to also be `` requiring improvement '' .
despite this there was one area they were considered to be `` good '' - that was the experiences and progress of care leavers .
the report said : `` local authority staff make strenuous efforts to maintain frequent contact with all of its care leavers , and have remained in touch with all of them for the last two years . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: managers 'have improvement plans '
text: a team of 10 ofsted inspectors looked at the work of leicestershire county council 's children 's services for four weeks at the end of 2016 .

they found the authority to be `` requiring improvement '' in all areas - children who need help and protection , children looked after and achieving permanence and leadership , management and governance .
they did however find managers knew where they needed to improve and already had some plans in place .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: services for children in leicestershire are 'not yet good '
text: the latest ofsted report for leicestershire county council is now public and says the county 's children 's services `` require improvement '' .
the report has said children at risk of significant harm were identified and protected .
however , children are not seen in a timely manner and experience delays in receiving help .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: what will be at each site of enterprise zone
text: the new `` enterpise zone '' will have three sites - two in loughborough and one in leicester .
the loughborough university science and enterprise park focusses on advanced engineering and manufacturing .
the charnwood campus in loughborough has specialisms in the life sciences , pharmaceutical and bio-medical sectors .
the leicester waterside area has a focus on space technologies , research and advanced manufacturing - it 's adjacent to the national space park development proposed by the university of leicester .
author: Matt Smith
BBC Radio Leicester Breakfast Show producer

documents.title: agencies work together for 'enterprise zone '
text: it 's a plan developed by loughborough university , leicester city and leicestershire county councils along with charnwood borough council and charnwood campus - that 's the former astra zeneca site in loughborough .
it was originally submitted to government in september 2015 .
it did n't get approval then but did get the thumbs-up in last march 's budget .
author: Matt Smith
BBC Radio Leicester Breakfast Show producer

documents.title: thousands of jobs for leicestershire
text: a government minister will be in leicestershire later this morning to unveil more details about a new enterprise zone - which could bring 6,500 new jobs to our area over the next decade .
the new research and development-led enterprise zone was announced in the budget last march but today it 's hoped we can get a clearer idea of how it will work .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest ofsted report
text: i 'm at county hall for a briefing about the latest ofsted report out today - more details to come .
author: Tim Parker
BBC Radio Leicester Political Reporter

documents.title: youngs helps england to an 'awesome ' win
text: it might not have been a very good weekend for football fans in leicester but for rugby fans it was great !
the england/leicester tiger scrum half tweeted his joy about the victories
awesome win yesterday and character from the team .
with leicester , norwich city , u20 and women 's team all winning it cant get any better .
great win yesterday !
do you support norwich ?
ben was born in our fine city .
amazing !
did n't know that
very well done ive now been to 14 of the 16 wins
next game please can you play with more pace and stop slowing it down
congrats matey .
cracking game all round
- exactly ben , fantastic day yesterday at the millennium stadium & carrow road ! !
great squad performance by both teams
well done for yesterday and congrats on the try !
bring on italy !
great win at millennium stadium , if a little tense , wales played very well though !
unless , of corse you win a second grand slam .
that would be better .
phenomenal game - last minute win shows new never give up attitude- elliott did well to catch biggar
@ twitterid you boys dug deep stood up and won the game
and not forgetting the mighty walsham winning ! ! !
actually a win for west brom would have good
i am sure they heard me screaming in holt ben , you were great , keep it up i have my flag flying in brändön x
@ twitterid were absolutely awesome
great win yesterday ! !
screaming at the tv all afternoon : ) @ twitterid and you play very well together : p
top day all in
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest leicestershire headlines
text: latest leicestershire headlines
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bridgen calls for bercow to go
text: the north leicestershire mp has taken to twitter to wade into the row over speaker john bercow 's comments about brexit
john bercow has been described as an umpire who wants to be the opening batsman , he 's been caught out and now its time for him to walk .
he should be sacked surely you should be able to trust the speaker to control himself
so prime minister evading questions & misdirecting is acceptable , but truth offends deeply !
she is sticking to her job berc should do the same
& btw her job is to serve the entire nation , not just a few tory donors , circling to make a quick buck .
the public are fond of john bercow so tell your tory friends it 's no go , the country is in crisis , do something useful .
in 1937 do we let it happen again , bercow ai n't going anywhere so get on with your job .
why ?
at least he is showing a backbone which is more than the rest of your party .
oh give over , snowflake
why do people use this pathetic insult , then assume argument won ?
# playingchesswithpigeons
@ twitterid # noball
you lot need to get off yer arses and do something about what 's happening in syria , your not being paid for the easy stuff
not for a mere player to send the umpire off , is it ?
that 's enough desperate witch-huntery from lobby fodder like you .
your forensic and impartial question of yesterday at pmqs demonstrated the fierce independence needed by a speaker # toady
i 'm ashamed that britain 's mp 's , all parties , but more the one in power , children tortured , people killed , this happened
sums it up .
nobody can regard him as neutral any more .
howzat ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes 'remembered and loved '
text: love the irony on richard osman from `` pointless '' tweeting about leicester city .
at least he 's optimistic
whatever happens this season , this leicester side under ranieri will always be remembered and loved by everyone ( except fans of 3-4 teams )
@ twitterid , , was that a pointless answer ? ?
there was very little lovable about them apart from the charming ranieri himself .
if you 'd said to leicester fans , you can win the premier league as long as you are relegated next season , how many wld say yes ?
ca n't think who you mean .
we beat them twice
i 'm saying we have no beef with you because we beat you home & away .
our beef is with the 17 teams that couldnt beat you once
especially by us if they play an even more weakened team in the last 16 of the f a cup !
stocksbridge park steels do n't even want vardy back
think everyone except for spurs fans really .
they are still bitter .
their only chance .
its tough down here richard .
real tough
they were on drugs last year , oh and had kante .
we all know this is true , from a non bitter ( honestly ) coventry city fan
dr bonar claims , they also linked to italian doping clinic mapei and kante 's performances very sus
i hate them .
something very sus about their title win and i 'm still fuming we came 3rd in a 2 horse race
credit to leicester for not sacking ranieri yet .
given kante looks like winning title 2 seasons on trot shows his influence
why would anyone love them ?
they 're cheats , dodgy finances and a racist upfront .
having recently got back from swansea , that is genuinely a nice thing to read .
it 's hurting pretty bad at the moment , though .
everyone loves us now because they 're guaranteed 3 points against us
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester in freefall
text: some stats for you now
leicester are the first reigning top-flight champions to fail to score in six consecutive league matches .
they have now gone over 10 hours without scoring in the premier league ( 610 minutes ) .
also - leicester have kept just two clean sheets in their last 18 premier league games .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: watch : monday 's weather
text: watch : monday 's weather
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: watch : ranieri on swansea performance
text: claudio ranieri reckons his team `` started well ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: leicester mercury news
text: today 's front page - read the headline story here .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: foxes slide further down the premier league
text: a bit of football now - this is leicester 's current position after another premier league defeat last night
they lost 2-0 against swansea .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : delays in aylestone
text: in # leicester traffic struggling on aylestone road due to temp lights close to cavendish road .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : shed load on m1
text: one lane is closed on the m1 northbound between j20 ( lutterworth ) and j21 ( leicester ) , because of a shed load .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: man in court over attempted murder
text: also over the weekend police charged a man with attempted murder after an `` incident '' on dominion road in glenfield .
troyde godfrey dixon is 27 years old and has no fixed address - he 'll appear at leicester magistrates court today .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man in 'critical condition ' after ashby fight
text: more bad news now about a fight in ashby over the weekend - it resulted in person being taken to hospital with head injuries .
it happened on market street early yesterday morning .
four men in their twenties were arrested on sus of grievous bodily harm .
three have since been bailed and one is still in custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: albanian murderer 'in oadby '
text: a deported albanian murderer has snuck back into the uk and is believed to be running a car wash in leicester .
author: The Daily Mail

documents.title: police appeal to students for information
text: lauric lebato was 22 years old and was a student from london .
over the weekend police have been appealing to other students in the city who might have information about what happened .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fatal stabbing in leicester
text: some rather major news from over the weekend to catch you up on - the suspected murder of a young man in leicester .
lemou ange lauric lebato , known as lauric lebato , was stabbed on albion street in the early hours of saturday
the 22-year-old was taken to hospital but later died .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning leicestershire - yes it 's monday morning already .
it was a bit of a damp and dreary weekend , was n't it ?
this is a photo i took in wigston yesterday
i 'll be looking after your local live page today with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you have any news or photos you 'd like to share please send me an email or use facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
